name: nfin
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1

stmt.origin: nfcxfr(s0, cin(c0, c1), crab(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))

comment: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the intersection of classes. (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
